meanings.definition: A person or thing that causes a tingling sensation.
meanings.sent1: The massage chair was a tinglers, making my back feel all tingly.
meanings.sent2: I felt tinglers in my fingers after holding the vibrating phone for too long.
meanings.sent3: The electric toothbrush turned into a tinglers, giving everyone a ticklish surprise.
meanings.sent4: The suspenseful movie was a tinglers, sending shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The icy wind felt like a tinglers, sending chills through my body.

meanings.sent1: The tinglers in my feet made me feel like I was walking on pins and needles.
meanings.sent2: She experienced tinglers in her scalp when the hairdresser used the scalp massager.
meanings.sent3: The anticipation of the surprise party created a tinglers in the air.
meanings.sent4: The excitement of the roller coaster ride was a tinglers throughout my body.
meanings.sent5: The tinglers from the spicy food lingered on my tongue.

meanings.sent1: The minty lip balm was a tinglers on my lips.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the wind chimes created tinglers in the peaceful garden.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected compliment was a tinglers in her heart.
meanings.sent4: The first sip of hot cocoa was a tinglers on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The gentle touch of the feather was a tinglers on my skin.
